nodes.description: 巴格达发生汽车炸弹爆炸，至少40人死亡
nodes.support_text: A fatal car bomb explosion in Iraq's capital Baghdad has killed at least 40 people according to local police sources.
The car was loaded with explosives and blew up near a shopping mall today leaving more than 60 injured, reports DPA.

nodes.description: 爆炸地点位于巴格达某购物中心附近
nodes.support_text: The car was loaded with explosives and blew up near a shopping mall today

nodes.description: 初步调查显示袭击者身份未明，但类似事件常被归因于ISIS
nodes.support_text: There was no initial indication on who was behind the blast. However this is common in Baghdad, where deadly bombing attacks are often thought to be carried out by ISIS.

edges.support_text: The car was loaded with explosives and blew up near a shopping mall today leaving more than 60 injured, reports DPA.
The car was loaded with explosives and blew up near a shopping mall today
There was no initial indication on who was behind the blast. However this is common in Baghdad, where deadly bombing attacks are often thought to be carried out by ISIS.
